docs.lead_paragraph: As a medical doctor, Kentucky Sen. Rand Paul has a rare set of credentials at the intersection of science and politics. But the glare of the 2016 presidential race is searing, and under it, Paul had a rough week.

headline.main: Paul on Vaccines, Thin Line Between Medicine and Politics

docs.lead_paragraph: Dr. Margaret Hamburg, who led the Food and Drug Administration for nearly six years, was praised and criticized for speeding the approval of medicines.

headline.main: F.D.A. Commissioner Leaving After Six Years of Breakneck Changes
headline.print_headline: F.D.A. Commissioner Leaving After Six Years of Breakneck Changes

docs.abstract: Food and Drug Administration Commissioner Dr Margaret Hamburg will step down following six-year tenure leading agency through some significant and challenging issues in public health; Hamburg grappled with painkiller abuse, obesity and the rise of electronic cigarettes, and received both praise and criticism for speeding up the approval of medicines.
docs.snippet: Dr. Margaret Hamburg, who led the Food and Drug Administration for nearly six years, was praised and criticized for speeding the approval of medicines.

docs.lead_paragraph: Several U.S. states are considering laws to make it harder for parents to legally opt out of vaccinating their children, as health officials fight a measles outbreak that has sickened some 120 people in more than a dozen mostly West Coast states.

headline.main: Lawmakers Want Tougher Vaccine Exemptions Amid Measles Outbreak
headline.print_headline: Lawmakers Want Tougher Vaccine Exemptions Amid Measles Outbreak

headline.main: Doctor, Have You Had Your DNA Tested?

docs.abstract: As a doctor who studies how patients make decisions about genetic testing, I often get asked whether I’ve had my own DNA tested.

docs.lead_paragraph: Dr. Margaret Hamburg, who as commissioner of the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) for almost six years has overseen public health initiatives ranging from tobacco control and food safety to personalized medicine and drug approvals, is stepping down, the agency said on Thursday.

docs.lead_paragraph: The senator, who adjusted course Tuesday and said vaccines were not harmful, was a member of the Association of American Physicians and Surgeons.

headline.main: Rand Paul Is Linked to Doctors’ Group That Supports Vaccination Challenges
headline.print_headline: Paul Is Linked to Group of Doctors Supporting Vaccination Challenges

docs.abstract: Kentucky Sen Rand Paul clarifies earlier comments on childhood vaccination by saying vaccines are not harmful; he was member of Assn of American Physicians and Surgeons, which lobbied for state laws permitting parents to not vaccinate their children based on their beliefs.
docs.snippet: The senator, who adjusted course Tuesday and said vaccines were not harmful, was a member of the Association of American Physicians and Surgeons.

docs.lead_paragraph: The national debate on measles and immunization poses a challenge for Republican presidential hopefuls, who must reconcile modern science with the skepticism of their core conservative voters.

headline.main: Measles Outbreak Proves Delicate Issue to G.O.P. Field
headline.print_headline: Measles Proves Delicate Issue to G.O.P. Field

docs.abstract: Measles outbreak has presented quandary for Republican contenders in 2016 presidential election as they seek to balance personal choice and public health in debate over vaccinations; candidates find themselves in familiar if uncomfortable position of reconciling demands of modern science with skepticism of their base.
docs.snippet: The national debate on measles and immunization poses a challenge for Republican presidential hopefuls, who must reconcile modern science with the skepticism of their core conservative voters.

byline.contributor: Jeremy W. Peters reported from Washington, and Richard Pérez-Peña from New York. Nick Corasaniti contributed reporting from Washington, and Kitty Bennett from St. Petersburg, Fla.
byline.original: By JEREMY W. PETERS and RICHARD PÉREZ-PEÑA
